title: Himi 76
lyrics:
M.NG.
1.
Sīsū ‘oku ou tatali
Ki he ‘Afiona
‘I ho fale, pea u kumi,
‘I he Folofola.
2.
’Oku ou ‘amanaki ni
Ke tau fetaulaki,
Mo e ‘Afiona ‘Eiki,
‘I ho hala lelei.
3. Pea u nofo longo mate
‘I ho ‘ao ‘Eiki
‘I ho’o Folofola mai;
Longo pē ‘a koe.
4.
Longo pē, pea ke ‘ilo
Ko e ‘Otua au;
‘Eiki, teu feinga ke ‘ilo,
Ko ko e pē ia.
5.
Keu ongo’i hono ‘aonga
‘O ho ta’ata’a,
‘I he’ene fakama’a
Hoku laumālie.
6.
Pea u fakaongo lelei
‘A e ‘Afiona,
Ki he kakai tu’utāmaki
‘I he angahala.*
